passive.name: Arcane Alignment
passive.description: All Astral spells recharge faster.

passive.name: Last Light
passive.description: All damage dealt is increased against targets below half health.

passive.name: Cosmic Air
passive.description: All flying creatures summoned by the Astral Monk are invisible.

primary.name: Astral Fists
primary.description: Pierces through enemies with colossal astral fists.

features.name: Combo Sequence
features.description: Alternates between Palm Strike (32) and Power Punch (47).

ultimate.name: Dimension of Varani
ultimate.description: Conjures a time bubble that freezes enemy projectiles and creatures inside it. The Ultimate is destroyed by Lifestone Large Shots (3 hits).

diffs.new_value: A Duelist who strikes from the shadows with fast astral fists and time-bending abilities.

passive.name: Ignition Spark
passive.description: Allied creatures near the Fire Elementalist capture Altar faster.

passive.name: Enduring Flame
passive.description: Damaging burning enemies heals the Fire Elementalist.

passive.name: Blazing Momentum
passive.description: When you or your creatures kill a Burning enemy, recharge Elemental spells.

primary.name: Flame Strikes
primary.description: Burns enemies with powerful Fire attacks.

features.name: Cleave
features.description: Attacks hit multiple enemies in an arc.

defense.name: Fiery Dash
defense.description: Performs an invincible dash in a chosen direction.

ultimate.name: Burning Conquest
ultimate.description: Captures a territory, inflicts Fire damage and fully infuses allied units and Titans with Fire.

diffs.new_value: A Conqueror who burns enemies with powerful fire attacks, cleaving through ranks and empowering allies.

passive.name: Scourge of War
passive.description: Increases Rank III population, reduces Rank II population.

passive.name: Forges of Valm
passive.description: Creatures spawned from Buildings have significantly more health.

passive.name: Field Commander
passive.description: While on the ground, nearby creatures gain a strong defensive buff.

primary.name: Twin Strike
primary.description: Strike with powerful mid-range attacks that interrupt enemies.

features.name: Cleave
features.description: Attacks hit multiple enemies in an arc.

defense.name: Rune Shield
defense.description: Raise a shield that protects allies and reflects attacks.

ultimate.name: Iron Tempest
ultimate.description: Unleash a metal vortex that deals heavy damage, staggers/knocks back all creatures inside.

diffs.new_value: A Conqueror who dominates the battlefield with heavy melee strikes, protective runes, and a metal vortex.

passive.name: Echo of Mercy
passive.description: While on the ground, the Mystic Scribe emits a healing aura.

passive.name: Holy Magic Mastery
passive.description: All Holy spells recharge faster.

passive.name: Thousand Favors
passive.description: Healing recharges Rank I and II creatures.

primary.name: Brush Strike
primary.description: Strike with enchanted ink to damage enemies and boost allies’ Max HP.

features.name: Cleave
features.description: Attacks hit multiple enemies in an arc.

defense.name: Scroll Barrier
defense.description: Creates a barrier that absorbs projectiles and reduces all damage. Absorbing Spellcaster projectiles refreshes Holy spells.

ultimate.name: Seal of Immortality
ultimate.description: Mark the ground with a massive healing seal.

diffs.new_value: An Enchanter who uses magical ink to damage enemies, heal allies, and create protective barriers.

passive.name: Mountain’s Favor
passive.description: The Stone Shaman’s attacks deal double damage to buildings.

passive.name: Child of the Titans
passive.description: Increases Rank II and Rank III population while reducing Rank I population.

passive.name: Pathfinder
passive.description: While on the ground, the Shaman recharges Wild spells much faster.

primary.description: Swing your catalyst to deal heavy melee damage and interrupt enemies.

features.name: Interruption
features.description: Successfully hitting a Spellcaster twice interrupts their actions.

features.name: Cleave
features.description: Attacks hit multiple enemies in an arc.

aura.name: Building Enchant
aura.description: Attacks enchant ally buildings, enabling them to emit a healing aura.

defense.name: Wind Shield
defense.description: Conjure a protective wind barrier that deals damage on contact.

ultimate.name: Wall of Kamazad
ultimate.description: Deploys a colossal wall capable of blocking Titans. The wall has 15000 Health and deals % damage to enemies in its path.

diffs.new_value: An Enchanter who channels the power of earth to deal heavy damage, interrupt spellcasters, and fortify buildings.

author: Wenedi
message: Update astral_monk.json

old_value.name: Last Light
old_value.description: Spells deal increased damage when the target is under half health.

new_value.name: Last Light
new_value.description: All damage dealt is increased against targets below half health.

old_value.name: Arcane Alignment
old_value.description: All Rank III Spells start with +1 Max Charge.

new_value.name: Cosmic Air
new_value.description: All flying creatures summoned by the Astral Monk are invisible.

old_value.name: Mantra of Power
old_value.description: When the Astral Monk kills a Spellcaster with a spell, she gains a charge of that spell.

author: Wenedi
message: Update iron_sorcerer.json

diffs.old_value: All Rank III Buildings start with +1 Max Charge.
diffs.new_value: Increases Rank III population, reduces Rank II population.

diffs.old_value: Unleash a metal vortex that deals heavy damage along its path.
diffs.new_value: Unleash a metal vortex that deals heavy damage and knocks back enemies along its path.

new_value.name: Field Commander

author: Wenedi
message: Update fire_elementalist.json

diffs.old_value: Captures a territory and inflicts Fire damage to any enemies in range.
diffs.new_value: Captures a territory, inflicts Fire damage and imbues allied units with Fire.

old_value.name: Fire Magic Mastery
old_value.description: All Fire spells and Fire-infused creatures deal more damage.

new_value.name: Enduring Flame
new_value.description: Damaging burning enemies heals the Fire Elementalist.

old_value.name: Blazing Momentum
old_value.description: After destroying an enemy with an Fire spell, all Fire spells recharge faster.

new_value.name: Blazing Momentum
new_value.description: When you or your creatures kill a Burning enemy, recharge Elemental incantations.

old_value.name: Ignition Spark
old_value.description: All Rank I Spells start with +1 Max Charge.

new_value.name: Ignition Spark
new_value.description: Allied creatures near the Fire Elementalist capture Altar faster.

author: Wenedi
message: Update swamp_witch.json

old_value.name: Brood Rite
old_value.description: All Rank I Creatures start with +5 Max Charge.

new_value.name: Brood Rite
new_value.description: When a Swamp Witch’s creature is destroyed, her incantations and abilities recharge faster.

old_value.name: Pact of Sacrifice
old_value.description: When a Witch's creature is destroyed, her spell and ability recharge faster.

new_value.name: Pact of Sacrifice
new_value.description: Killing Poisoned Creatures recharges Necromancy spells.

new_value.name: Swarm Dominance
new_value.description: The Swamp Witch has more Rank I population, but less Rank II and Rank III population.

author: Wenedi
message: Update stone_shaman.json

diffs.old_value: Hurls a massive boulder dealing 30 damage.
diffs.new_value: Swing your catalyst to deal heavy melee damage and interrupt enemies.

diffs.old_value: Creates a temporary wall blocking movement.
diffs.new_value: Conjure a protective wind barrier that deals damage on contact.

diffs.old_value: Shakes the ground, slowing enemies and dealing area damage.
diffs.new_value: Deploys a colossal wall capable of blocking Titans.

old_value.name: Earth Attunement
old_value.description: Regenerates health faster while standing on ground.

new_value.name: Child of the Titans
new_value.description: Increases Rank II and Rank III population while reducing Rank I population.

old_value.name: Rock Solid
old_value.description: Cannot be knocked back by minor explosions.

new_value.name: Pathfinder
new_value.description: While on the ground, the Shaman recharges Wild incantations much faster.

old_value.name: Stone Skin
old_value.description: Reduces incoming physical damage by 5%.

new_value.name: Mountain’s Favor
new_value.description: The Stone Shaman’s attacks deal double damage to buildings.

new_value.name: Spellcaster Interruption
new_value.description: Successfully hitting a Spellcaster twice interrupts their actions.

message: feat(hero): update hero schema structure and add 5 heroes

passive.name: Mantra of Power
passive.description: When the Astral Monk kills a Spellcaster with a spell, she gains a charge of that spell.

passive.name: Last Light
passive.description: Spells deal increased damage when the target is under half health.

passive.name: Arcane Alignment
passive.description: All Rank III Spells start with +1 Max Charge.

primary.name: Astral Fists
primary.description: Pierces through enemies with colossal astral fists.

ultimate.name: Dimension of Varani
ultimate.description: Conjures a time bubble that freezes enemy projectiles and creatures inside it.

passive.name: Ignition Spark
passive.description: All Rank I Spells start with +1 Max Charge.

passive.name: Fire Magic Mastery
passive.description: All Fire spells and Fire-infused creatures deal more damage.

passive.name: Blazing Momentum
passive.description: After destroying an enemy with an Fire spell, all Fire spells recharge faster.

primary.name: Flame Strikes
primary.description: Burns enemies with powerful Fire attacks.

defense.name: Fiery Dash
defense.description: Performs an invincible dash in a chosen direction.

ultimate.name: Burning Conquest
ultimate.description: Captures a territory and inflicts Fire damage to any enemies in range.

passive.name: Forges of Valm
passive.description: Creatures spawned from Buildings have significantly more health.

passive.name: Scourge of War
passive.description: All Rank III Buildings start with +1 Max Charge.

primary.name: Twin Strike
primary.description: Strike with powerful mid-range attacks that interrupt enemies.

defense.name: Rune Shield
defense.description: Raise a shield that protects allies and reflects attacks.

ultimate.name: Iron Tempest
ultimate.description: Unleash a metal vortex that deals heavy damage along its path.

passive.name: Holy Magic Mastery
passive.description: All Holy spells recharge faster.

passive.name: Thousand Favors
passive.description: Healing recharges Rank I and II creatures.

passive.name: Echo of Mercy
passive.description: When the Mystic Scribe heals an ally, she is healed for the same amount.

primary.name: Brush Strike
primary.description: Strike with enchanted ink to damage enemies and boost allies’ Max HP.

defense.name: Scroll Barrier
defense.description: Creates a barrier that absorbs projectiles and reduces all damage.

ultimate.name: Seal of Immortality
ultimate.description: Mark the ground with a massive healing seal.
